channel.title: Dennis Bevington
channel.description: Recent news about Dennis Bevington, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Northern News Services (subscription)
item.description:
'A bad time to lose a month of parliamentary business'
Prime Minister Stephen Harper's plan to prorogue parliament and wait until after the Thanksgiving break to begin a new session could delay the devolution transfer date, according to Western Arctic MP Dennis Bevington. Although the territorial government ...

item.title: Mentioned by HQ Yellowknife
item.description:
MP thinks Prime Minster's tour just a photo op
Yellowknife, NWT - The M-P for the Western Arctic says the Prime Minister's just completed trip to the North was nothing more than a taxpayer-funded photo-op. Dennis Bevington says Stephen Harper made no new announcements that will benefit folks who ...

item.title: Mentioned by HQ Yellowknife
item.description:
Western Arctic MP reacts to prorogation.
... currently on a week-long swing through northern Canada, says the government plans to deliver a throne speech in October, after the Thanksgiving weekend, kicking off a new parliamentary session. Western Arctic M-P Dennis Bevington is not impressed.

item.title: Mentioned by Northern News Services (subscription)
item.description:
Residents celebrate rainbow of identities at NWT Pride
The festival, in its second year in this incarnation, kicked off Friday with a breakfast hosted by Western Arctic MP Dennis Bevington. During the noon hour, those passing by the post office were treated to free rainbow-coloured cake dished out by volunteers ...

item.title: Mentioned by Northern News Services (subscription)
item.description:
Residents celebrate rainbow of identities at NWT Pride
SOMBA K'E/YELLOWKNIFE The NWT Pride festival featured three days and nights of events this past weekend. The festival, in its second year in this incarnation, kicked off Friday with a breakfast hosted by Western Arctic MP Dennis Bevington.
